title: Stocks Slip Ahead of Fed Meeting as Treasury Yields Tick Up | The Close 11/8/2025
description: Bloomberg Television brings you the latest news and analysis leading up to the final minutes and seconds before and after the closing bell on Wall Street. Today's guests are Harvard University’s Gita Gopinath, Man Group’s Matt Rowe, TD Cowen’s Doug Creutz, Cambridge Associates’ Andrea Auerbach, UBS Alignment Partners’ Alli McCartney, Westwood Management’s Adrian Helfert, Colliers’ Anjee Solanki, Macy’s Toney Spring, Sleep Number’s Linda Findley. (Source: Bloomberg)
